EmailTemplate.name: 04-07-22 Hos BiWeekly Newsletter.Email 1
EmailTemplate.subject: EDC Implementation Training Available on NCRU
EmailTemplate.textOnly: April 07, 2022 EDC Implementation Training NCR Payment Processing for EDC Implementation training is available on NCRU: NPP for EDC Implementation (Course #82470). Partner Enablement Call Schedule We will be switching up the cadence of our Partner Enablement Calls between April and May. Our Q2 schedule is as follows at 1:30PM ET: April 15, May 6, May 20, June 3, June 17. If you or a colleague needs to be added to our Partner Enablement Calls, please reach out to your Channel Account Manager or Jessica Weatherford (Jessica.Weatherford@ncr.com <[[mailto:Jessica.Weatherford@ncr.com]]>). <[[https://www.facebook.com/ncrcorp/?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://twitter.com/NCRCorporation?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.instagram.com/ncrcorporation/?${url-parameter}"> Â© 2019 NCR Corporation All rights reserved. 864 Spring St NW, Atlanta, GA 30308 https://www.ncr.com/ <[[https://www.ncr.com/?${url-parameter}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]>
